SQL> describe employees;
 Name                                      Null?    Type
 ----------------------------------------- -------- ----------------------------
 EMPLOYEE_ID                               NOT NULL NUMBER(6)
 FIRST_NAME                                         VARCHAR2(20)

 EMAIL                                     NOT NULL VARCHAR2(25)
 PHONE_NUMBER                                       VARCHAR2(20)
 HIRE_DATE                                 NOT NULL DATE

  1  select first_name,job_id,salary,
  2  case job_id when 'it_prog' then 1.1*salary
  3  	when 'st_clerk' then 1.15*salary
  4  	when 'sa_rep' then 1.20*salary
  5  	else salary end "REVISED_SALARY"
  6* from employees

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  select department_id, job_id, count(employee_id), count((department_id)),count(commission_pct),min(salary),max(salary)
  2  from employees
  3  group by department_id, job_id

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  select department_id,job_id,count(employee_id), count((department_id)),count(commission_pct),min(salary),max(salary),
  2  avg(salary)
  3  from employees
  4  group by department_id,job_id
  5  having avg(salary) > 8000
  6* order by (department_id)
